target.mrk: 按合作伙伴的税收计算

trans-unit.source: Displays the tax information for this item as returned by your tax partner.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the tax information for this item as returned by your tax partner.

target.mrk: 显示税收合作伙伴退回的此项目的税收信息。

trans-unit.source: The <uicontrol>Tax Calculated by Partner</uicontrol> column displays the tax information as calculated and returned by your tax partner. You can compare the information in this column with the corresponding information in the <uicontrol>Tax in Journal Entry</uicontrol> column. The information in these two columns typically match, reflecting that the information was communicated in an <uicontrol>Update</uicontrol> call. If the information in these two columns don’t match, then there was a discrepancy between what your SAP system calculated and what your tax partner returned. This indicates that the successful update was a <uicontrol>Force Update</uicontrol>. In the case of a <uicontrol>Force Update</uicontrol>, the <uicontrol>Tax Calculated by Partner</uicontrol> is provided for your information and reference.

seg-source.mrk: The <uicontrol>Tax Calculated by Partner</uicontrol> column displays the tax information as calculated and returned by your tax partner.
You can compare the information in this column with the corresponding information in the <uicontrol>Tax in Journal Entry</uicontrol> column.
The information in these two columns typically match, reflecting that the information was communicated in an <uicontrol>Update</uicontrol> call.
If the information in these two columns don’t match, then there was a discrepancy between what your SAP system calculated and what your tax partner returned.
This indicates that the successful update was a <uicontrol>Force Update</uicontrol>.
In the case of a <uicontrol>Force Update</uicontrol>, the <uicontrol>Tax Calculated by Partner</uicontrol> is provided for your information and reference.

target.mrk: <uicontrol>按合作伙伴的税收计算</uicontrol>列显示由税收合作伙伴计算和返回的税收信息。
您可以将此列中的信息与<uicontrol>日记账分录中的税</uicontrol>列中的相应信息进行比较。
这两列中的信息通常匹配，反映信息是在<uicontrol>更新</uicontrol>调用中通信的。
如果这两列中的信息不匹配，则您的 SAP 系统计算内容和税收合作伙伴返回的内容之间存在差异。
这表示成功更新属于<uicontrol>强制更新</uicontrol>。
在<uicontrol>强制更新</uicontrol>的情况下，会提供<uicontrol>按合作伙伴的税收计算</uicontrol>供您参考。
